candidates.why: Same workflow/tools family; same session inputs; same planning-artifact outputs; invokes action-planning-agent.
Similar planning artifact generation; includes task JSON generation + validation gates; shows agent-invocation structure.
Coordinator-level command that calls TDD task generation as a phase; clarifies chain integration points and artifact expectations.
Adjacent phase input for TDD task generation (coverage gaps and test focus); shares session path conventions and validation style.
Upstream prerequisite for context-package discovery; provides established patterns for session discovery + context-package handling.

selected.why: Closest match to the required two-phase flow (context preparation -> planning doc generation) and shares the same session artifacts and action-planning-agent invocation pattern.
